attribute.name: id
attribute.description: Id of the component

attribute.name: rendered
attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the visibility of the component

attribute.name: binding
attribute.description: An EL expression that maps to a server-side component instance in a backing bean

attribute.name: value
attribute.description: Value of the component that can be either an EL expression or a literal text

attribute.name: converter
attribute.description: An EL expression or a literal text that defines a converter for the component. When it's an EL expression, it's resolved to a converter instance. In case it's a static text, it must refer to a converter id

attribute.name: immediate
attribute.description: Boolean value that specifies the lifecycle phase the valueChangeEvents should be processed, when true the events will be fired at "apply request values", if immediate is set to false, valueChangeEvents are fired in "process validations" phase. Default is false

attribute.name: required
attribute.description: Boolean value that makes the component required, default value is false

attribute.name: validator
attribute.description: A method binding EL expression that refers to a method for validating the input

attribute.name: valueChangeListener
attribute.description: A method binding EL expression that refers to a method for handling a value change event

attribute.name: requiredMessage
attribute.description: Message to be displayed when required field validation fails

attribute.name: converterMessage
attribute.description: Message to be displayed when conversion fails

attribute.name: validatorMessage
attribute.description: Message to be displayed when validation fails

attribute.name: widgetVar
attribute.description: Javascript variable name of the wrapped yui widget

attribute.name: mindate
attribute.description: Sets calendar's minimum visible date. Can be java.lang.String or java.util.Date. If String, mindate will be parsed with the format "MM/dd/yyyy".

attribute.name: maxdate
attribute.description: Sets calendar's maximum visible date. Can be java.lang.String or java.util.Date. If String, maxdate will be parsed with the format "MM/dd/yyyy".

attribute.name: pages
attribute.description: Enables multiple page rendering if more than 1, default value is 1.

attribute.name: disabled
attribute.description: Disables the calendar.

attribute.name: mode
attribute.description: inline|popup, Defines how the calendar will be displayed; "inline" only displays a calendar, "popup" displays an input text and a popup button

attribute.name: pattern
attribute.description: DateFormat pattern, default is "MM/dd/yyyy"

attribute.name: locale
attribute.description: Locale for localization and date conversion, can be String or a java.util.Locale instance.

attribute.name: popupIcon
attribute.description: Icon of the popup button

attribute.name: popupIconOnly
attribute.description: When enabled, popup icon is rendered without the button.

attribute.name: navigator
attribute.description: Enables month/year navigator

attribute.name: timeZone
attribute.description: String or a java.util.TimeZone instance to specify the timezone used for date conversion, defaults to TimeZone.getDefault()

attribute.name: readOnlyInputText
attribute.description: Makes input text of a popup calendar readonly.

attribute.name: onSelectUpdate
attribute.description: Specifies the components to update with ajax when a date is selected.

attribute.name: selectListener
attribute.description: A server side listener to invoke instantly with ajax when a date is completed

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: Style of the main container of calendar.

attribute.name: styleClass
attribute.description: Style class of the main container of calendar.

attribute.name: inputStyle
attribute.description: Style of the input text of popup display.

attribute.name: inputStyleClass
attribute.description: Style class of the input text of popup display.

attribute.name: showButtonPanel
attribute.description: Specifies the visibility of button panel that contains today and done buttons.

attribute.name: effect
attribute.description: Specifies the effect to use when displaying and hiding the calendar.

attribute.name: effectDuration
attribute.description: Specifies the speed of the display effect used.

attribute.name: showOn
attribute.description: Specifies the event to display the overlay in popup mode, valid values are "focus", "button" and "both".

attribute.name: showWeek
attribute.description: When enabled, week number of year is displayed next to each week.

attribute.name: showOtherMonths
attribute.description: When enabled, days belonging to other months are displayed.

attribute.name: selectOtherMonths
attribute.description: When enabled, days belonging to other months become selectable.
